literal_meaning: Not every day is a butter day for the cat.
figurative_meaning: Life has its ups and downs; not every day is a holiday.
example: Sometimes you have to work hard; не все коту масленица.

literal_meaning: To hang noodles on someone's ears.
figurative_meaning: To deceive someone or tell them lies.
example: He was just vешать лапшу на уши with his tall tales.
Her sudden arrival was как снег на голову for everyone at the party.

literal_meaning: To make an elephant out of a fly.
example: Stop делая из мухи слона; it’s not that big of a deal.

literal_meaning: In the absence of fish, even a crayfish is a fish.
figurative_meaning: In the absence of better options, one must settle for what is available.
example: It’s not my dream job, but на безрыбье и рак рыба.

literal_meaning: Only the grave can correct a hunchback.
figurative_meaning: Some people cannot change their ways or character.
example: He will never change; горбатого могила исправит.

literal_meaning: The dog barks, the wind carries it away.
figurative_meaning: People may talk, but it doesn't matter in the grand scheme of things.
example: Don't worry about what they say; собака лает, ветер носит.

idiom: На вкус и цвет товарища нет
literal_meaning: There are no comrades in taste and color.
figurative_meaning: Everyone has different preferences; don't judge others' tastes.
example: You may not like it, but на вкус и цвет товарища нет.

figurative_meaning: To idle away time or do nothing useful.
example: He spends all day бить баклуши instead of working.
